name: Seth Godin
background: Born 1960, Stanford MBA. Author of 20+ books on marketing/leadership. Founded Yoyodyne (sold Yahoo $30M). Daily blogger at seths.blog. Key works: Permission Marketing (1999), Purple Cow (2003), Tribes (2008), Linchpin (2010), This is Marketing (2018). Focus: Remarkability, permission, tribes, human-centered change.
